title: Behavioral Health Services Oversight and Accountability Commission.
subject: BehavioralHealthServicesOversightandAccountabilityCommission

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law requires the Behavioral Health Services Oversight and Accountability Commission to biennially report to various legislative committees the outcomes for those receiving community mental health services under a full service partnership model.

This bill would make a technical, nonsubstantive change to that provision.

actions.description: Introduced. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.

extras.impact_clause: An act to amend Section 5845.8 of the Welfare and Institutions Code, relating to mental health.
